comunication
Class TransportLayer

java.lang.Object
  comunication.TransportLayer
All Implemented Interfaces:
TransportLayerEventSource, UdpPushListener
public class TransportLayer
extends java.lang.Object
implements UdpPushListener, TransportLayerEventSource

This class resolves comunication protocol request for sending/receiving bytes to/from Arduino and manages events for PUSH notifications.

Author:
Lorenzo Corneo
